title: Tenth Congress of the Association of European Psychiatrists (AEP 2000)
abstract: The 10th Congress of the Association of European Psychiatrists (AEP 2000) will be held in Prague, Czech Republic, from 28 October to 1 November 2000. For information and further details, please contact AEP Congress Organizers: POB 50006, Tel Aviv 61500, Israel; tel 972 3 5140018/9; fax 972 3 5172484/5175674; email AEP2000@kenes.com; website www.kenes.com/aep
